name: Shangri-La Golden Sands
description: Overlooking Batu Feringgi Beach, Shangri-La Rasa Sayang, Penang offers spacious rooms surrounded by 30 acres of tropical gardens. It features two outdoor swimming pools in the Garden Wing and one adult pool in the Rasa Wing pool accessible for Rasa Wing Rooms & Suites bookings only.
address: Jalan Batu Ferringhi, Kampung Tanjung Huma, 11100 Batu Ferringhi, Penang.
topRatedComment: Excellent service! The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and comfortable, and the view from our room was breathtaking. We will definitely be coming back!

name: Eastern & Oriental Hotel
description: The Eastern & Oriental Hotel – known simply as the ‘E&O’ to generations of travellers – exudes a charm that is inimitably its own. For most of its history, its passageways and halls were the preserve of the rich and privileged from the Western world – intrepid travellers that included acclaimed writers and aspiring literati who arrived in steamships seeking to experience the exotic East.
topRatedComment: Amazing views! The beach was just a few steps away from our room. The breakfast buffet had a great variety of options, and the pool area was very relaxing. Highly recommend!

name: G-Hotel Gurney
description: G Hotel is an urban oasis, fitting for both discerning business and leisure guests. Rich in modern contemporary architecture and opulent interior designs, the 312-room hotel offers spacious rooms with stunning views of the ever-evolving skyline or Straits of Malacca. Discover just about everything Penang has to offer right at your doorstep for unimaginable convenience.
topRatedComment: Great location! The hotel is right by the beach, and the view from our room was amazing. The staff were friendly and accommodating, and the room was clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay here again!

name: The Edison
description: A meticulously restored Colonial mansion set in the heart of historical George Town, Penang - a Lifestyle Hotel awaits to be discovered. Offering a combination of luxurious comfort, exceptional guest service and gracious hospitality, it is where one can truly Experience the Exceptional.
topRatedComment: The Edison is well located, there are plenty of restaurants and bars nearby, along with so many of the local historic buildings close by. The Jetty's are about a 20 minute walk away and you can look at a lot of the local street art on route. Albert and his team were friendly and very helpful, with so much knowledge of the area.
